fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Sylvan Flame: Deal a Basic Attack to your target. **Locked**: This ability does a Powerful Attack if at least 3 Beasts are alive, and an Unstoppable Attack if 5 or more Beasts are alive.
-Disappearance: Deal a None Attack to your target. If they die tonight, their death will not be revealed until a player attempts to visit them (starting on the next night). **Locked**: This now deals a Basic Attack.
-Attain Perfection (**Locked**, 1-shot): If no Beasts die between now and the end of the day following the next, the Beasts will instantly win. (ie if this is used on Night 2, Beasts win on the End of Day 4). This cannot be used if you are the only living Beast.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Grilled by Grigg**
-**Locked**: Your presence in the game is announced if you are alive and Unlocked at the beginning of Day 3.
-**Unlock Condition**: If no Beasts died before the end of Day 2 (including lynch), Unlock.
